ygData.subject: Luclin screenshots and new figures
ygData.msgSnippet: OK - in the first place, why do they only release shots of Gnomes? The ugliest critters on the face of Norrath, and that s all they can show?! (j/k for all you
ygData.messageBody:
OK - in the first place, why do they only release
shots of Gnomes? The ugliest critters on the face of
Norrath, and that's all they can show?! (j/k for all you
Gnomes out there -- they are cousins of my favorite
race, Dwarves, after all).<br><br>Go here to see new
Luclin screenshots, about 40 of
'em:<br><a href=http://gamespot.com/gamespot/filters/products/screenindex/0,11104,477597,00.html target=new>http://gamespot.com/gamespot/filters/products/screenindex/0,11104,477597,00.html</a><br><br>I decided that what it is about the new character
models is not that they look cartoonish, but that they
look like claymation. I looked at one and thought --
"Hey, that guy was in Chicken Run!" This could be a
calculated move on their part -- if you're ever going to do
a movie, why not have the characters look like they
do in the game?! Just a (conspiratorial) thought. I
am a Rogue, you know.<br><br>Kharlisht
